official_title: A bill to amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to increase penalties for violation of the provisions of such Act relating to odometers.

summary.text: Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to increase civil and criminal penalties for violation of the provisions of such Act relating to odometers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to increase penalties for violation of the provisions of such Act relating to odometers.
